local_intent: Approach the table placement area by moving above the target at a 0.10 m offset, confirming arrival.
assumptions: place_on_table refers to a valid placement target frame/pose
Path to approach is collision-free at the chosen offset
coherence_with_global: Implements the approach step: verifies object in gripper, moves above place_on_table with 0.10 m offset and 2000 ms timeout, then verifies arrival.
